reporter_caption.center: GRIFFITH LOGGING v. ORIX FIN. SERV., 28 So.3d 48 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 2010)

caption.center: Daniel Griffith Logging, Inc. v. Orix Financial Services, Inc.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Escambia County. T. Michael Jones, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Stephen C. Bullock of Brannon, Brown, Haley Bullock, P.A., Lake City, for Appellants.
Robert E. Biasotti of Carlton Fields, P.A., St. Petersburg, and Christine Davis Graves of Carlton Fields, P.A., Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
LEWIS, THOMAS, and WETHERELL, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
